, defense officials listed a series of actions the military has taken to guard against contractor wrongdoing, including the formation of a working group focused on procurement fraud. Sen. Bernie Sanders said much more needs to be done. It is clear that DoD's current approach is not working, and we need far more vigorous enforcement to protect taxpayers from massive fraud, he said. Then Eric Schmidt continued, Hundreds of these people will be located right here in our technology center in Munich. By comparison, Google only added 1,069 employees worldwide during the fourth quarter of 2010, so if this hiring spree occurs in the space of a few months, it'll represent a seriously quickened pace.

Amarillo for Amber Alert Awareness Day Howard Stern calls Jay Leno a "crook" in interview Piers Morgan Tonight, the shock jock calls the NBC late-night host "insane" and accuses him of stealing sketch ideas. Jay Leno is a crook and the world knows exactly what he's up to. He steals a tremendous amount of material, The New York Post quoted Howard Stern as saying. said: "I love The Hoff." The first of the judges to arrive was motormouth comic Michael McIntyre , 34, who knew exactly what he was after from the Scottish acts. He said: We've had Subo then we had Janey Cutler. "This year I'm looking for an even older woman. "They are getting older and older. "I'm hoping for a 98-year-old woman to just turn up and blow the roof off the Armadillo. Michael McIntyre and The Hoff took over judges' duties from Piers Morgan and Simon Cowell , who will return for the live TV shows. Also gee-ing up the crowd were pint-sized Geordie presenters Ant and Dec.
